name: Bullet Heli
description:
Quick jam game we made, so certain things are still pretty rough!

Bullet Heli is a splitscreen bullet hell shooter, where you and a friend team up in your copters to destroy waves of enemy gunner turrets.

  • Works best with a controller
  • If you get a gameover then you need to restart the game. Alt-F4 is your friend!

Enjoy :)
